text: Lawrence Joseph Zahab (April 3, 1937 â€“ March 21, 2022), known professionally as Lawrence Dane, was a Canadian actor and movie producer. He was best known for his role as Lt. Preston in Bride of Chucky. He retired in 2017. Dane died from pancreatic cancer at Niagara-on-the-Lake, Canada on March 21, 2022 at the age of 84.David Friend, "'Scanners' and 'Bride of Chucky' actor Lawrence Dane dies at 84". Penticton Herald, March 22, 2022.Victoria Ahearn, "Canadian actor-producer Lawrence (Zahab) Dane has died at age 84".
